AI Description: pycoQC is a Python package designed for parsing Oxford Nanopore sequencing quality control (QC) reports. It provides tools for analysis, visualization, and assessment of sequencing performance metrics.
Core Features: Parsing Oxford Nanopore Sequencing Qc Reports, Analysis Of Sequencing Metrics, Quality Control Assessment, Visualization Of Qc Data
General Tags: Python Package, Bioinformatics, Quality Control, Data Analysis, Visualization
